    • chooseLeaders

      private void chooseLeaders()
      This method is called when the client receive a ChooseLeader message from the model. It changes the scene and the fxml file associated to that scene

    • chooseResources

      private void chooseResources​(int initialRes)
      This method is called when the client receive a ChooseResource message from the model. It changes the scene
      Parameters:
      initialRes - the amount of resources the user has

    • disableButtons

      private void disableButtons()
      Method called when the user receives confirmation of an ending turn action. It calls the corresponding method on the BoardController

    • enableButtons

      private void enableButtons()
      Method called when the user receives a message telling that it is his turn. It calls the corresponding method on the BoardController

    • disableMandatory

      private void disableMandatory()
      Method called when the user receives confirmation of a mandatory action. It calls the corresponding method on the BoardController

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String message)
      This method shows an information alert on screen.
      Parameters:
      header - is the header of the Alert.
      message - is the message of the Alert.

    • started

      private void started()
      Method called when a started message arrives from the model. It does the first update of the personalboard, market and decks

    • endTurn

      private void endTurn​(Message message)
      Method called when a EndTurnAnswer arrives from the model. If the player ended the turn and it is a solo game, this method shows an alert containing the token activated. If the player ended the turn but it is a multiplayer game, the buttons on the board.fxml are disabled. Otherwise, this method shows an alert containing infos about the player that ended the turn and the current player
      Parameters:
      message - the Message arrived from the model

      update in interface SourceListener

      SourceListener
